# A New Building for FAM

[ ](https://www.freeportartmuseum.com/newbuilding)

### A long anticipated move for the museum

After many years of searching for a suitable downtown space for the Freeport Art Museum, planning and construction is now underway to renovate a beautiful and historical property to provide a new home for all our activities. With ample space for classes, exhibitions, and events, this new location will place the museum in the heart of our community. Browse our New Building page for more details and watch for updates soon! 

[ ](/fam-new-building)
